topic.title: Screeps, anyone?
topic.body:
I was just wondering if there are some other people here playing Screeps (https://screeps.com/).
Maybe we can arrange a ZN exclusive alliance or something.

1545703017_1DoWuJgxohLZ3Ctbm5U6mZ2r7RF3U.body: In case you want to get into it, I suggest you buy it on Steam as it is currently 30% off there.

1549642501_17Dvd3j3RtTZ8z5xqUDVuc9LqNFVH.body: Are you sure? The version you download on zeronet.io is 0.6.4 which is the latest release.

Well, the latest release on github is 0.6.4...
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/releases
